fields.name: HairRestorationQuestionnairesDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Hair Restoration Questionnaires

fields.name: LabelHairRestoration
fields.fieldText: General Hair Loss Questionnaire

fields.name: LabelFacialHair
fields.fieldText: Facial Hair Loss Questionnaire

fields.name: TrichotillomaniaFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Do you have a history of excessively pulling out your beard hairs(Trichotillomania)?

fields.name: LastEpisodeFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, when was your last episode?

fields.name: LaserHairRemovalFaceFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you had Laser Hair Removal to your Face?

fields.name: PhyTraumaFaceFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Do you have a History of Physical Trauma to the Face?

fields.name: DiagnosisFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you ever been diagnosed with any form of skin disease, such as Alopecia Areata, Alopecia Barbae, Alopecia Totalis or Psoriasis?

fields.name: DiagnosisWhatWhenFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, what is your diagnosis, when were you diagnosed and what treatments have you tried?

fields.name: RedFlakeInflameFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you noticed any redness, flaking and/or inflammation to the face area?

fields.name: ProdThickenHairFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: What products have you tried to help grow or thicken your facial hair?

fields.name: HairLossBothersomeFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Which areas of hair loss are most bothersome?

fields.name: GoalsExpectationsFacialHairLoss
fields.fieldText: What are your goals and expectations with facial hair transplant surgery?

fields.name: LabelEyebrowHair
fields.fieldText: Eyebrow Hair Loss Questionnaire

fields.name: ThinningEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: When did you first notice thinning of your eyebrows?

fields.name: OverPluckingEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Do you have a history of over plucking?

fields.name: ExcessRubEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Do you excessively rub your eyebrows?

fields.name: ExcessPullEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Do you have a history of excessively pulling out your eyebrow hairs (Trichotillomania)?

fields.name: LastEpisodeEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, when was your last episode?

fields.name: TraumaEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Do you have a history of trauma to the eyebrows?

fields.name: LaserHairRemovalEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you had laser hair removal to the eyebrow?

fields.name: TattoedEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you had your eyebrows permanently tattooed?

fields.name: DiagnosisEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you ever been diagnosed with any form of skin disease, such as alopecia areata, alopecia barbae, alopecia totalis or psoriasis?

fields.name: DiagnosisWhatWhenEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, what is your diagnosis, when were you diagnosed and what treatments have you tried?

fields.name: RedFlakeInflameEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you noticed any redness/flaking/inflammation to the eyebrows (seborrheic dermatitis)?

fields.name: LowIronEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Do you have a history of low iron?

fields.name: BloodWorkEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, when was your last blood work checked?

fields.name: BloodWorkCheckEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, are you taking any supplementation?

fields.name: ThyroidDiseaseEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you ever been diagnosed with Thyroid Disease?

fields.name: DiagnosisThyroidEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, what is your diagnosis?

fields.name: ThyroidCheckEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: When was your thyroid level last checked?

fields.name: SeriousIllnessEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you had a serious illness during the past year?

fields.name: IllnessWhatHowEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If yes, what illness and approximately how long ago?

fields.name: MedicationsEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Are there any types of medications that you were taking when you noticed your eyebrow hairs falling out?

fields.name: MedWhatWhenEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, which medication(s) and when did you begin taking the medication(s)?

fields.name: ProductThickenHairEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: What products have you tried to help grow or thicken your eyebrow hairs?

fields.name: GoalsExpectEyebrowsHairLoss
fields.fieldText: What are your goals and expectations with eyebrow transplant surgery?

fields.name: LabelEyelashHair

fields.fieldText: When did you first notice thinning of your eyelashes?

fields.fieldText: Do you excessively rub your eyelashes?

fields.fieldText: If so, when was your last episode?

fields.fieldText: Do you have a history of physical trauma to the eyelashes?

fields.name: DiagnosisSkinEyelashHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you ever been diagnosed with any form of skin disease, such as alopecia areata, alopecia adnata, alopecia universalis, psoriasis, seborrheic dermatitis or systemic lupus erythematous?

fields.name: DiagnosisWhatWhenEyelashHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, what is your diagnosis, when were you diagnosed and what treatments have you tried?

fields.fieldText: Have you noticed redness/flaking/inflammation to the eyelashes (blepharitis)?

fields.fieldText: Have you ever been diagnosed with Thyroid Disease?

fields.fieldText: If so, please list drug name and dates of treatment:

fields.name: MedicationEyelashHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Are there any types of medications that you were taking when you noticed your eyelashes falling out?

fields.name: MedicationWhatWhenEyelashHairLoss
fields.fieldText: If so, which medication(s) and when did you begin taking the medication(s)?

fields.name: LatisseEyelashHairLoss
fields.fieldText: Have you ever tried Latisse (Bimatoprost) to grow your eyelashes?

fields.name: CurrentEyelashHairLoss
